data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - Abstract Assassin Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Abstract Assassin DLC Weapon Skin pack is for those that want to turn heads… before exploding them. Containing three eye-popping skins, including Paint Spill, Round Geometrical Painted and Dark Hex Camo, why blend in when you can stand out?

Featuring:
  • Paint Spill Weapon Skin
  • Round Geometrical Weapon Skin
  • Dark Hex Camo Weapon Skin

*Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Czech
*languages with full audio support
